channel.title: Wiretap from CBC Radio
channel.description: Unlike anything on the radio, Wiretap takes you on a weird, emotional journey into the mind of Jonathan Goldstein. It's full of his friends and family who you'll grow to love as your own.
channel.itunes:author: CBC Radio
channel.itunes:summary: Unlike anything on the radio, Wiretap takes you on a weird, emotional journey into the mind of Jonathan Goldstein. It's full of his friends and family who you'll grow to love as your own.
